title: Serious Sam =HiT-SQUAD
text:
Serious Sam er bara helviti góður finnst mér,skemmtileg vopnin svona saman blanda af DOOM og QUAKE
fyrir þá sem ekki hafa prófað endilega farið og DL testinu
http://www.hugi.is/files/games/demos/SeriousSamPublicTest2.exe
og lika komin patch og hann er á fileplanet
http://www.fileplanet.com/index.asp?section=560&file=53946&download=1
og siðan er verið að búa til MOD sem heitir HiT-SQUAD sem hljóðar svona
HiT-SQUAD is a teamplay modification for the game Serious Sam. Players can choose from 2 different teams: “hired guns” and “mafia”. This team aspect is similar to Counter-Strike in many regards, yet has many more gameplay opportunities, being that both teams are not “good guys”. Weapons in this game are based tightly upon real modern weapons. Their accuracy, ballistics, and animations will tightly adhere to their real world counterparts. Damage will be handled in a semi realistic manner, so that it will not degrade the quality of the gameplay experience.
